dmca.title: Fast Growing Trees Grows Copyright Complaint
dmca.body: Google, I am the webmaster for www.Fast-Growing-Trees.com. The copyright infringement at issue is that www.Quick-Growing-Trees.com has copied most of their content from www.Fast-Growing-Trees.com. One of our sales representatives discovered this blatant rip-off of our website. Most of their pages are duplicates of ours. They have stolen many of our pictures and product descriptions, as described below: Royal Empress Tree                    Original Page: http://www.fast-growing-trees.com/EmpressTree.htmOffending Page: http://www.quick-growing-trees.com/store/index.php?act=viewProd&productId=2 Willow Hybrid TreeOriginal Page: http://www.fast-growing-trees.com/WillowHybrid.htmOffending Page: http://www.quick-growing-trees.com/store/index.php?act=viewProd&productId=8 Hybrid Poplar TreeOriginal Page: http://www.fast-growing-trees.com/HybridPoplar.htmOffending Page: We purchased the rights to use this imaged. Burning Bush ShrubOriginal Page: http://www.fast-growing-trees.com/BurningBush.htmOffending Page: http://quick-growing-trees.com/store/index.php?act=viewCat&catId=8 Red Twig DogwoodOriginal Page: http://www.fast-growing-trees.com/RedTwigDogwood.htmOffending Page: http://quick-growing-trees.com/store/index.php?act=viewProd&productId=60 Infringing Website Contact Information: Quick Growing Trees Nursery [private] Altamont, TN 37301 [private]@Quick-Growing-Trees.com have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed. Thank You, [private] Fast Growing Trees Nursery
